# supportedNumberOfTrackedFaces

**Type Property**

The maximum number of faces that the framework can track.

## Declaration

```swift
class var supportedNumberOfTrackedFaces: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Do not exceed this value when you set [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFaceTrackingConfiguration/maximumNumberOfTrackedFaces].

## Tracking Multiple Faces

- **maximumNumberOfTrackedFaces**: The number of faces to track during the session.
